launch: Which national anthem do you want to play?
unsupported: Sorry, I don't understand this command.

help.text: This skill allows you to play the national anthem for different countries. Just say "Play the national anthem of %s".
help.reprompt: Which anthem do you want to play next?

play.reprompt: Which anthem do you want to play next?
play.unknown-country: I don't know the national anthem of %s. Please choose another country.
